java/liquibase/commandline/CommandLineFileOpener.java

00001 package liquibase.commandline;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00004 
00005 import java.io.IOException;
00006 import java.io.InputStream;
00007 import java.net.URL;
00008 import java.util.Enumeration;
00009 
00015 public class CommandLineFileOpener implements FileOpener {
00016     private ClassLoader loader;
00017 
00018     public CommandLineFileOpener(ClassLoader loader) {
00019         this.loader = loader;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String file) throws IOException {
00023         URL resource = loader.getResource(file);
00024         if (resource == null) {
00025             throw new IOException(file + " could not be found");
00026         }
00027         return resource.openStream();
00028     }
00029 
00030     public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String packageName) throws IOException {
00031         return loader.getResources(packageName);
00032     }
00033 
00034     public ClassLoader toClassLoader() {
00035         return loader;
00036     }
00037 }
